name: Dreamer (In development)
description:
Read before playing!    

    I had to publish the game half finished at least to respect the release date.
 I rushed to make the game minimum playable, so if you see a lot of problems in my game,
please report them and don't worry, I'll quickly update the game !

 I didn't have enough time to make a mobile version and add some features.
(please subscribe to be notified of future updates!)

Dreamer is a 2D platformer, where someone is bored and winder if he was in a game. He imagine a world where he can create everything he want.

In this game, you will play this person in 4 worlds where each will give you a specific power. Over time, elements will appear in the game like jump pads, spikes or even enemies

This project is for the moment in development and will be release at February 2023.
